function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor air ventilation in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and airflow within buildings","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, ventilation fans","People":"Occupants of buildings, particularly in densely populated areas","Owner":"Building management, property owners, architects"},{"Description":"Creation of new disease conditions by building systems","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread, such as Legionnaire's disease","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of building systems, monitoring water and air quality","Technologies":"Water filtration systems, air quality sensors, regular maintenance protocols","People":"Occupants of buildings, maintenance staff, building management","Owner":"Building management, property owners, maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Lack of sanitation in sewage systems","Impact":"Facilitation of fecal-oral transmission routes for diseases such as cholera","Mitigation":"Improving sanitation in sewage systems, implementing waste treatment processes","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, waste treatment facilities, sewage infrastructure","People":"Communities with poor sewage systems, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, urban planners"}]}
